# 1. Project Overview
AromaCraft Ingredients Ltd. requires a **Market & NPD Intelligence Report** for **East Africa (Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Ethiopia)** to guide flavour pipeline development, pack & price architecture, and consumer engagement strategy.

This document defines scope, deliverables, data sources, KPIs, risks, and timeline following the **APAPASA** (Ask–Plan–Prepare–Analyse–Share–Act) framework.

# 2. Objectives
- Quantify market size and growth (Volume & Value, CAGR 2019-2024)
- Identify top NPD launches & flavour trends across beverage, bakery & snack categories
- Map key players & trade/investment flows
- Profile Gen Z vs Millennial consumers
- Recommend flavour & pack formats for 2026 innovation pipeline

# 3. Scope
| Dimension | Specification |
|------------|---------------|
| Geography | East Africa — Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Ethiopia |
| Categories | Beverage (soft & alcoholic), Bakery, Savoury snacks |
| Period | 2019 – 2024 (YTD) |
| Output | Tableau Dashboard + PDF Report + GitHub Repo with R Markdown & Data Changelog |

# 4. Data Sources
1. **Open Food Facts** — product & flavour metadata  
2. **Kaggle F&B Sales & NPD Datasets** — category sales proxies  
3. **UN Comtrade API** — imports/exports of beverage & ingredient HS codes  

# 5. Deliverables by Phase
| Phase | Deliverable | Primary Tool |
|--------|--------------|--------------|
| Ask | Business Case & Analytical Questions | R Markdown |
| Plan | Formal SOW (this file) | R Markdown → PDF |
| Prepare | Data Inventory + Data Changelog | BigQuery + R |
| Analyse | CAGR models, trend charts, flavour heatmaps | R (tidyverse) |
| Share | Tableau dashboard + executive deck | Tableau |
| Act | Pilot recommendations | Word/PDF |

# 6. Success Metrics (KPIs)
- Market sizing accuracy ≥ 90% traceable to source  
- Top-10 flavours identified with dual-source validation  
- Interactive Tableau dashboard with country/category filters  
- GitHub repo with complete Data Changelog and R Markdown reproducibility  

# 7. Risks & Mitigation
| Risk | Impact | Mitigation |
|-------|---------|------------|
| Incomplete data coverage | Medium | Triangulate across Open Food Facts & Comtrade |
| Inconsistent product taxonomy | High | Canonical mapping during Prepare |
| Limited BigQuery quota | Low | Use Sandbox efficiently, export filtered CSVs |

# 8. Timeline (6 Weeks)
| Phase | Duration | Output |
|-------|-----------|--------|
| Plan | 1 wk | Approved SOW |
| Prepare | 2 wks | Clean datasets + Data Changelog |
| Analyse | 2 wks | Statistical analysis + visuals |
| Share | 0.5 wk | Tableau & PDF |
| Act | 0.5 wk | Pilot brief |

# 9. Governance
- All data changes must be logged in `README.md` (Data Changelog)  
- All analysis steps must be documented in `.Rmd` files  
- Movement to next phase requires sign-off on previous deliverables
